description: Used to Get All Main Info For The Patient like Name, Age, Gender and More

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient

responseDescription: Receives User Info, or one of the common Errors

description: Used to Get Patient Account Info , this info is like Height, Weight, Blood Type and More Related to Patient Personal Information, The Default Value of all The Response Parameter is Null, which Mean that the User did't Change it yet or Left it Empty

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient

responseDescription: Receives  The List of Patient Account Info, or one of the common Errors

description: Used to Edit Patient Account Info , this info is like Height, Weight, Blood Type and More Related to Patient Personal Information, the Only Required Parameter is patientID, the Rest of Parameter is Optional Related To What Needed To Be Changed

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient
(optional or Could Be Null) The Height of the Patient
(optional or Could Be Null) The Weight of the Patient
(optional or Could Be Null) The Blood Type of the Patient
(optional or Could Be Null) The Martial Status of The Patient
(optional or Could Be Null) Weather the Patient is Drinking Alcohol or Not
(optional or Could Be Null) Weather the Patient is Using any Drugs or Not
(optional or Could Be Null) Weather the Patient is Religious or Not
(optional or Could Be Null) The Name of Patient Religion

responseDescription: Receives 'Done' Text if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors

description: Used to Change The Patient Name

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient
The New Name that The User Picked

responseDescription: Receives 'Done' Text if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors

description: Used to Change The Patient Bith Date

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient
The Edited Bith Date  of The User

responseDescription: Receives 'Done' Text if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors

description: Used to Change The Patient's Profile Image'

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient
The Name of the Profile Image The should be Recieved From Profile upload Endpoint, See General Section

responseDescription: Receives 'Done' Text if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors

description: Used to get User's Hobbies

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient

responseDescription: Receives Hobbies List, or one of the common Errors

description: Used to Add Patient Hobby

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient
The Hoby Name Like 'Football' or 'Swimming

responseDescription: Receives 'Done' Text if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors

description: Used to Delete Patient Hobby

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient
The Hoby id in the DB, Which is returned in the Get Request
Who is Sending this Request? 'patient' or 'doctor', this is Used for More Auth

responseDescription: Receives 'Done' Text if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors

description: Used Get The List of Patient Diagnoses

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient

responseDescription:
Receives 'Done' a List of The Diagnoses that this Patient Have One the System,
 For Each Diagnose The Data is the Same, The Name of the Diagnose, the Doctor Name is The Doctor who set This Diagnose, 'auther' which means Who Add This Diagnose on the App, The Patient set it to himeself as a part of completeing His Accound, or a Doctor on our System Set it

description: Used to Make Patient Add a Patient Diagnose for Himself (as a Part of Account Info)

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient
The Name of the Diagnose like 'Despression' or 'ADHD'
The Name of the Doctor the set this Diagnose
(optional or Could Be Null) When The patient Got Diagnosed with this Diagnose

responseDescription: Receives 'Done' Text if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors

description: Used to Delete Patient Diagnose

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient
The Diagnose id in the DB, Which is returned in the Get Request
Who is Sending this Request? 'patient' or 'doctor', this is Used for More Auth

responseDescription: Receives 'Done' Text if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors

description: Used Get The List of Patient medicines

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient

responseDescription:
Receives a List of The medicine that this Patient Have One the System,
 For Each medicine The Data is the Same, The Name of the medicine, the Doctor Name is The Doctor who set This medicine, 'auther' which means Who Add This medicine on the App, The Patient set it to himeself as a part of completeing His Accound, or a Doctor on our System who Set it

description: Used to Make Patient Add a Patient Diagnose for Himself (as a Part of Account Info)

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient
The Name of the Diagnose like 'Despression' or 'ADHD'
The Name of the Doctor the set this Diagnose
The Frequncy of This Medicine, like, take Two Bills a day or One Bill Each 3 Days
Weather the Patient Still Taking that Medicine or not
(optional or Could Be Null) When The patient Start to Take This Medicine
(optional or Could Be Null) When The patient Should Stop to Take This Medicine

responseDescription: Receives 'Done' Text if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors

description: Used to Delete Patient Medicine

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient
The Diagnose id in the DB, Which is returned in the Get Request
Who is Sending this Request? 'patient' or 'doctor', this is Used for More Auth

responseDescription: Receives 'Done' Text if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors

description: Used Get The List of Patient Prescription File, Like Paper Prescriptions or PDFs

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient

responseDescription:
Receives a List of Prescription Files that this Patient Have One the System,
 For Each File The Data is the Same, The file which is the Name of The File on our System, this name is optained on /upload General Endpoint, the Doctor Name is The Doctor who set This Prescription, 'auther' which means Who Add This Prescription on the App, The Patient set it to himeself as a part of completeing His Accound, or a Doctor on our System who Set it

description: Used to Make Patient Add a Patient Prescription File for Himself (as a Part of Account Info)

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient
The Name of the File which is Returned from /upload General Endpoint (See General Section for more details About /uplaod)
The Name of the Doctor the set this Diagnose

responseDescription: Receives 'Done' Text if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors

description: Used to Delete Patient Prescription File

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient
The Prescription id in the DB, Which is returned in the Get Request
Who is Sending this Request? 'patient' or 'doctor', this is Used for More Auth

responseDescription: Receives 'Done' Text if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors

description: Used to Change the User Interface Language, With Notification Lang

parameters.paramDescription: The ID of the Patient
The Language Name shorten like 'en' for English or 'ar' For Arabic

responseDescription: Receives 'Done' Text if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors

description: Used to Delete Patient Account With all Related Information like Diagnoses, Medinces and More

parameters.paramDescription: The Email of the User

responseDescription: Receives 'The Account is Deleted Successfully' Text and the System Will Send an Email as a Goodbye if Everything Went Well, or one of the common Errors
